ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, my enchanter at L5 ran across a twinked L2 rogue fighting an orc centurion.  The orc would only ding him for 1-2 points every few hits.  He was
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 29 Nov 1999 silky@... wrote:
>
> Twinking is not nearly as unbalancing as most folks presume. How many times
> have you seen someone in armor - with weapons WAY over their level -
> running from an orc pawn - or screaming for help?

Actually, my enchanter at L5 ran across a twinked L2 rogue
fighting an orc centurion. The orc would only ding him for
1-2 points every few hits. He was healing at a normal 1 point
every 6 seconds so he was effectively taking no damage. He
could barely hit the orc because it was red to him. So the
result was a stalemate as these two hacked at each other for
almost 10 minutes. He could've breezed through L1-5 without
any downtime if he'd stuck with even-con mobs.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
